Package Classes

Class BTree

java.lang.Object
Classes.BTree
public class BTree
extends java.lang.Object
Class that implements a B+tree on the disc using 2 files, one index and one data file.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> counters
    List that contains the measurements we took in the tests (For Testing reasons).
    private FileHandler fileHandler
    FileHandler instance that handles the files.
    private int maxNum
    Max key value.
    private int numOfKeys
    Variable that contains the number of keys needed to be inserted in order to create a B+Tree.
    private int numOfRuns
    Number of runs we make in each test.
    private int root_page
    Variable that holds the root page of the tree.
    private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> upperBounds
    List that contains the upper bound values we use (For printing reasons).

      List that contains the upper bound values we use (For printing reasons).

      private final java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> counters
      List that contains the measurements we took in the tests (For Testing reasons).

      FileHandler instance that handles the files.

  • Constructor Details

    • BTree

      public BTree​(int numOfKeys, int maxNum, int numOfRuns, int page_size, int info_size, int rec_size_index, int rec_size_data, int key_size, int dataPage_size, int key_value_offset) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Constructor for the B+tree.
      Parameters:
      numOfKeys - Number of keys to create the tree.
      maxNum - Max value of possible key.
      numOfRuns - Number of runs we will perform in each test.
      page_size - Size of page that stores a node of the tree.
      info_size - Size in bytes of every variable that contains information about a node.
      rec_size_index - Size in bytes of a key and its value.
      rec_size_data - Size in bytes of a key in the data file.
      key_size - Size in bytes of a key.
      dataPage_size - Size in bytes of all the information a node has.
      key_value_offset - Offset in bytes between a key and its corresponding value.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - Exception if an error occurs while handling the files.

    • createTree

      public void createTree​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> usedKeys_create)
      Method for creating a B+ Tree.
      Parameters:
      usedKeys_create - List that contains the keys we are going to insert in the tree in order to create the tree.

    • insertKeys

      public void insertKeys​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> usedKeys_insert)
      Method we call for inserting a number of random and unique keys in the B+ Tree.
      Parameters:
      usedKeys_insert - List that contains the keys we are going to insert in the tree.

      private void insert​(java.lang.Integer key, java.lang.Integer value)
      Method for inserting a key and its value to the B+ Tree.
      Parameters:

      value - The corresponding value we are inserting.

    • findCorrectLeafNode

      private BTreeLeafNode findCorrectLeafNode​(java.lang.Integer key, BTreeNode root)
      Method for searching the leaf node in which the key we are looking for should exist.
      Parameters:
      key - The key we are looking for.
      root - The BtreeNode instance that holds the root node.
      Returns:
      The BTreeLeafNode instance in which the key should exist.

    • searchTree_key

      public void searchTree_key​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> usedKeys_search)
      Method we call in order to search a number of random keys in the tree.
      Parameters:
      usedKeys_search - List that contains the keys we are going to search in the tree.

    • search

      private int search​(int key)
      Method for searching a key in the B+tree.
      Parameters:
      key - The key we are looking for.
      Returns:
      The value of the corresponding key if the key exists or -1 if the key does not exist.

    • searchTree_Range

      public void searchTree_Range​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> usedKeys_searchRange, int upperBound)
      Method we call for searching keys in a given range.
      Parameters:
      usedKeys_searchRange - The list that contains the keys we are going to use as lower bound in the search range.
      upperBound - The value that we are going to use as an upperBound.

    • searchRange

      private void searchRange​(int lowerBound, int upperBound)
      Method for searching keys in a given range.
      Parameters:
      lowerBound - The value that we are going to use as an lowerBound.
      upperBound - The value that we are going to use as an upperBound.
